title: 820-3115b
message:
this machine when placing a video and increasing it crashes and it turns off
these are the tests done
test with operating system in good condition, change hard drive, change ram memory, test in each memory slot, disconnecting wifi and optical drive, problem persists

title: 820-3115b
message:
Try tu run a graphics stress.
Also run corresponding ASD test.

title: 820-3115b
message:
running asd it crashes
graphics stress test it crash and turns off( se bloquea y se apaga solo)

title: 820-3115b
message:
Run Windows/Linux Live, which will not load graphics driver.
See if machine still crashes.

title: 820-3115b
message:
NO; or do it without installing graphics driver.
Windows Live will use generic driver anyway.

title: 820-3115b
message: What is the condition of the heatsink? The heatpipe could be damaged and therefore be ineffective in drawing heat away from the CPU. I have seen this on many different models, and had to replace. See if the end of the pipe is hot (where the fins are) when its been on for a while. If its cold, its broken...or isn't making good contact with the CPU.

title: 820-3115b
message: sorry I did not understand, how do you say install windows directly without bootcamp

title: 820-3115b
message:
"Windows Live will use generic driver anyway."
That means to boot Windows Live (through USB); use Google...

title: 820-3115b
message: Then bad CPU; its iGPU block has problems.

title: 820-3115b
message: Can I transfer the cpu from another board scrap that I have and the board will  good?

title: 820-3115b
message: That can be done, if you have the necessary tools...
